subject: Re: UK Brief - new content and page brief

full_threads.body:
Hi Anita, 

Confirming the requested updates have been completed, you can review them here: 
https://withstella.co.uk/gap-insurance/
https://withstella.co.uk/legal/

Please review and let me know if there are any further updates.

Hi @chris done following updates

1. ✅ Update Wording on paragraph one
2. ✅ Revert H1 to what it was "GAP Insurance"
3. ✅ Phone number on call back is not hyperlinked or bold
4. ✅ https://withstella.co.uk/legal/ -
a) ✅ add #8 GAP Insurance
b) ✅ include link to IPID https://withstella.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/IPID-GAP-FIGL.pdf
c) ✅ include link to PW https://withstella.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/PW-GAP-FIGL.pdf

Note: for #2, I just updated the text description and remove the heading Guaranteed Asset Protection (GAP) because we already have an H1 heading in the banner titled with "Gap Insurance" ( see screenshot )


Time: +10mins @ricaV2

Hi @jaime pls let me know when you are back, we can go through the below.

1. Update Wording on paragraph one 
2. Revert H1 to what it was "GAP Insurance"
3. Phone number on call back is not hyperlinked or bold
4. https://withstella.co.uk/legal/ -
a) add #8 GAP Insurance 
b) include link to IPID https://withstella.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/IPID-GAP-FIGL.pdf
c) include link to PW https://withstella.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/PW-GAP-FIGL.pdf

Hi @chris done with the following updates and one remaining updates

Updates
✅ Guaranteed Asset Protection (GAP) Insurance is designed to cover the gap between the purchase price of your [...]
✅ If you purchased your car from a dealership within the last 180 days, this policy pays the difference, up to the policy [...]
✅ If you have a car on contract hire or lease, Stella Gap Insurance ensures that you won't have any financial impact or liability if your car is written off. [...]
✅ If you purchased your car privately or over 180 days ago, Stella GAP Insurance will pay the difference between the insurance pay out from your motor insurer and the Glass's [...]
✅ To discuss our GAP Insurance, or request a quote, please call us on 0333 996 2499 or request a call back using [...]

✅ They work from 9am to 5:30 – please will you remove 8am?
✅ The year field looks squashed – can this be widened?
✅ This takes you to the car insurance Q&B – I think we need to update the text to say Get a car insurance quote in minutes….. or remove the option.

✅ And a blurb to the car insurance page under optional extras content section.
✅ Stella Proposed Text: Covers the difference between the original purchase price and the current market value at the time of write off. Find out more about Gap Insurance.
✅ Clicked on: Find out more about Gap Insurance.

Remaining Updates
@chris do you know where can I find the  IPID and Policy wording ?
it needs to add  legal page under the optional extras section

Time: +35mins @ricaV2
@jaime are you ok to tackle these updates please?

Hi Rica,

Hope you're well.

The UK team have come back with some changes. See attached.

We will also need to add the IPID and Policy wording to the legal page under the optional extras section.



And a blurb to the car insurance page under optional extras content section.

Stella Proposed Text: Covers the difference between the original purchase price and the current market value at the time of write off. Find out more about Gap Insurance.

Clicked on: Find out more about Gap Insurance.

New page - http://www.withstella.co.uk/gap-insurance



Any questions please let me know. Thanks so much!

Anita

Head of Marketing

Hi Anita,


Just wanted to give you the good news that we've sorted out those updates you asked for.


You can check out the changes we made by clicking on this link: Gap Insurance Draft


If everything looks good to you, let us know, and we'll go ahead and push it live. If you have any further requests or need any adjustments, just give us a shout.

Hi @ricaV2 updates completed in gap insurance page draft

Add the two policy docs.

Thanks

Anita

Hi Anita, 


Thanks for submitting your request. We have created a 'draft' page for you to review. Once you approved, we will proceed in adding the link to the car insurance page, which will direct users to the gap insurance page.


Here is the link: 

https://withstella.co.uk/gap-insurance-draft/


Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
